name: Panzer Dance
effects: Increase DEF by 100% for one turn to all allies

desc_short: Boost DEF for all allies and boost DEF and SPR after using shooting dance

Augmente la DEF de tous les alliés et DEF/PSY après avoir utilisé Danse inspirante

desc_long: Boosts DEF for all allies and boosts DEF and SPR after using shooting dance.
